name: Reactor Conquer
description:
A game about conquering the grid, using dynamic and predictive strategy Features:
  • 2 to 8 player multiplayer
  • A 6x10 Grid to fill up efficiently with 3D Atoms
  • Explosive Atoms! Dont burn yourself...
  • LAN server discovery
  • UPNP, to play through the internet, you can get your ip by searching in the internet

If UPNP doesnt work, you should forward port 5555

ALL PLAYERS SHOULD REMAIN CONNECTED UNTIL THE END OF THE MATCH

Reactor Conquer was done in 3 weeks, as a quick side project, updates are still open to do so, so if you want me to add something just tell
